Pre-Game Insights: In their last seven head-to-head clashes, India have a perfect win record against Ireland.
Ireland are playing their first game of this season.
India are also playing their first game of this season.
The pitch at the Nassau County International Cricket Stadium, New York, is balanced.
Temperature is expected to be around 21.63 C and humidity is expected to be around 67%.
4.42 m/s winds are expected. Cloud cover is expected, so expect some movement to aid the pace bowlers.
